nodes.text: A reinforced combat staff was an effective weapon crafted with a solid wooden shaft, flexible metallic core, durable iron surface, and crystalline balance tabs. The staff was a melee weapon polearm.

Reinforced combat staffs appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
